EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────────────────
### Copper Cable Factory Interface (around Position(x=2.5, y=17.5))
Consists of the following interconnected entities:
• Cable factory input chest at Position(x=2.5, y=17.5)
• Dedicated factory burner inserter at Position(x=3.5, y=17.5) (facing RIGHT)  
  – Neighbour linked to an assembling machine at Position(x=1.5, y=19.5)

### Depot Belt Structure (centered at Depot Chest, Position(x=3.5, y=15.5))
Built to serve as the belt depot and transfer point:
• Belt depot wooden chest at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5)
• Adjacent transport belt segment at Position(x=4.5, y=15.5)
• Dedicated depot burner inserter at Position(x=3.5, y=14.5) (using direction UP)

### Extraction System Interface (at Extraction Burner Inserter, Position(x=-3.5, y=27.5))
This interface provides the extraction source:
• Extraction system burner inserter at Position(x=-3.5, y=27.5) with its drop position at Position(x=-3.5, y=28.5)

### Isolated Wooden Chest (Position(x=-4.5, y=18.5))
An additional chest appears on the map:
• Wooden chest placed at Position(x=-4.5, y=18.5)  
  (Intended as a belt depot target though not integrated into the main depot structure)

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────────────────
• Transport Belt Connection Error  
  – When connecting transport belts, do not target entities that are incompatible (for example, a Prototype.SteamEngine). Always add an inserter that inputs items into the target entity and use that as the connection endpoint.

• Placement Distance Error  
  – If placement fails due to the target position being too far (for instance, a chest at (3.5,15.5) rejected because the player is at (0,0)), move closer to the target location before attempting placement.

• Undefined Variable Error  
  – Errors such as "name 'target_chest' is not defined" indicate a variable naming or scoping issue. Confirm that all variables are correctly defined and referenced prior to use.

• Inventory Shortage Error  
  – If placement fails because the required entity (e.g. a wooden chest) is missing from the inventory, verify that the inventory contains the necessary item before placement attempts.
